# Prompt 

A deranged lunatic sent us the following letter:

```
  I am a deranged lunatic. How do you know? Because I have the following information to tell you

  g = 
  n = 
  enc = 

  Signed,

  Derrick Lewis (DL)
```

# Category 

Crypto 

# Files to Release

```
N/A
```

# Remote

`N/A`

# Solution 

Discrete Logarithm Problem is the idea here.
`./solve/answer.py` solves this while `problem.py` generated the problem

`cc_ctf{derrick_lewis_seems_like_a_pretty_nice_guy_actually}`
